basics.name: Jaden Morga
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Managment Information Systems at the Shidler College of Business School at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in December, 2023.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

work.summary: Developed & managed an end-to-end marketing campaign comprising of product research, competitor analysis, metric optimization, SEO, and business development
highlights: Leveraged google analytics and trends to develop custom google ads, terminus banners, and an email campaign, leading to a 334% increase in webpage traffic
Collaborated with engineers to translate technical details into interpretable deliverables for key stakeholders

work.summary: Organize and conduct 10+ school activities and fundraising events for 700+ students
highlights: Survey over 600 students weekly to determine brand preferences and quality of product
Increase audience engagement on Instagram by 58.3% from March-April 2022

volunteer.summary: Assisted in underwriting $1,000+ contracts to create solid agreements between various companies
highlights: Raised over $10,000 in funds for the radio station alongside the current marketing committee
Coordinated and successfully organized Radiothon, an event lasting 10 days to raise money from listeners

volunteer.summary: Produced daily promotional materials including flyers, posters, and other media for students, professionals, and the community
highlights: Vice President of Promotions, AMA Manoa, 2021-2022
